```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


Let's import the `FAS_litters.csv` csv.

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

litters_df

```

Import the same dataset using an absolute path.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
litters_df_abs = 
  read_csv("~/Desktop/data_wrangling_1/data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df_abs = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

litters_df_abs
```
